SONIC JOBS Job Search

Brief: SONIC JOBS Job Search is the ultimate app for individuals seeking employment opportunities within a range of industries including restaurants, bars, healthcare, and more. Designed for job seekers such as waiters, chefs, drivers, and sales assistants, this app streamlines the process of creating CVs and applying for jobs with incredible ease, directly from your mobile device.
